DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : COMPANY TOWN ANNEX
DOC.TEXT: Sara Lee Corp . said its restructuring effort will cut its worldwide work_force by 9 # 900 employees , an increase over the 8 # 300 jobs losses it predicted last spring . . . . Toyota Motor Corp. ' s Lexus Division said it will hold_the_line on the U.S. price of its redesigned 1995 LS 400 luxury car at $ 51 # 200 , unchanged from the 1994 model it replaces .
